item.description:

item.title: Copilot Recall: Microsoft rolls out AI screenshot tool - BBC
item.description:
1. Copilot Recall: Microsoft rolls out AI screenshot tool  BBC

  3. Windows 11’s controversial Recall feature could soon arrive for Copilot+ PCs – I just hope Microsoft’s tightening of its privacy is up to scratch  TechRadar

  5. That groan you hear is users’ reaction to Recall going back into Windows  Ars Technica
